name: foo_cad
body:
Installation
---------

* Ensure that foobar2000 1.1.11 or higher is installed
* [Download foo_cad](https://github.com/downloads/poiru/foo-cad/foo_cad-1.0.0.fb2k-component)
* Run (double-click) the downloaded file to install

**Note:** If you are running a portable version of foobar2000, use `Library` → `Configure` → `Components` → `Install...`. Then, select the select the downloaded file to install.
tagline: CD Art Display/Rainmeter interface plugin for foobar2000.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
